resources.string: How do I create a goal?
How do I edit a goal?
How do I complete or remove a goal?
How do the bubbles on the Visual Tab signify goals?

Click the ‘+’ button on the bottom right corner of the either tab to create a new goal. Add a name for a goal, and rate the importance and expected difficulty of the goal, with 5 being most important/difficult. If desired, add further description. When finished, click the ‘Add Goal’ button to create the goal "bubble" on the visual tab.
Click on a bubble in the Visuab Tab to see its name, and click the edit button to update the goal.
Long click on a bubble in the Visual Tab for options to complete or delete the goal. When you complete a goal, it will be marked as completed on the List Tab.
The color and size of the bubble will illustrate the goal’s importance and difficulty rating. The larger and darker the bubble equates with a higher the importance and difficulty rating.
